intro: Witheringia phyllantha, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its fleshy, thick leaves and showy, tubular flowers. Witheringia phyllantha is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
